coreAtributes.authorTag: On the inside of the shell, rubberised ink reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's combat helmet
coreAtributes.description: A ballistic helmet covered with tough fabric cover lined with shock-absorbing foam. The attached suspension system has plenty of adjustment to fit a variety of head shapes but the faint star on the forehead gives you little doubt as to the intended wearer.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the combat helmet and securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the chinstrap.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] the combat helmet on [npc2.namePos] head and securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the chinstrap.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the combat helmet down on [npc2.namePos] head and practically [npc.verb(gag)] [npc2.her] with the chinstrap.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] un[npc.do] the chinstrap on [npc.her] combat helmet and [npc.verb(ease)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] un[npc.do] the chinstrap on [npc2.namePos] combat helmet and [npc.verb(ease)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rip)] open the chinstrap on [npc2.namePos] combat helmet and [npc.verb(yank)] it off [npc2.her] head.
